message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.
I appreciate the offer, but $18,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend.  I'm very interested in this product and would be happy to pay $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, $10,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $14,000.

I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is still more than I can comfortably afford.  I'm prepared to pay $12,000, which is a fair price considering it's still below your value and well above my budget.
